Observation: Implementation of the strategic plan overall Government National Development Plan (NDP II) expired at the end of FY 2019/20. In line with the NDP II, the URC had an approved strategic plan for the period 2016/2017 -2020/21, which set out both the long term and short term targets to be achieved during the duration of the strategic plan. This being the 2 nd last year of implementation of the URC’s strategic plan, I undertook an assessment of the achievement of the Corporations’ strategic targets/goals. noted that at the time of the audit (June 2020), out of the planned five (5) strategic targets/goals, no target had been fully achieved; all the five (5) were partially achieved as summarized in Table 5 below. Recommendation: advised the Accounting Officer to devise a strategy of increasing the passenger train coaches, goods routes, and also engage the business community for increased carriage. I
